name.description: Name is the name of the associated Karpenter NodePool object

labels.description: Labels are the domain labels that should be present on the NodePool

taints.description: Taints are the domain taints that should be present on the NodePool

recommended_instance_types.description: RecommendedInstanceTypes are the list of instance types that the NodePool should be restricted to

target_name.description: TargetName refers to the associated NodePool (if exists) that the recommendation was created from

target_hash.description: TargetHash is a hash of the original NodePool (if exists) at the time the recommendation was generated

ClusterAutoscalingValues.title: Cluster Autoscaling Values
ClusterAutoscalingValues.description: ClusterAutoscalingValues represents the fields in a cluster autoscaling recommendation.

ClusterAutoscalingValuesList.title: Cluster Autoscaling Values List
ClusterAutoscalingValuesList.description: ClusterAutoscalingValuesList represents a list of cluster autoscaling recommendations. These recommendations are formatted into Karpenter NodePools to be applied in the customer's environment.

DomainLabels.title: Domain Labels
DomainLabels.description: DomainLabels represents the set of domain labels that should be present on the NodePool.

Taints.title: Taints
Taints.description: Taints are the minimum set of taints that should be set on the NodePool
